org.mmbase.servlet

Class JumpersFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.servlet.JumpersFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter, MMBaseStarter

    public class JumpersFilter
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter, MMBaseStarter
    Redirects request based on information supplied by the jumpers builder.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Jaco de Groot
    Application:
    Tools, Jumpers
